overview:
Stephen Rhodes is a mobile and digital expert with deep experience in the media and entertainment industry. He serves as the SVP, Technology Catalyst, for the digital creative technology agency ExpandTheRooom. Previously he led global client technology initiatives at Mediabrands, the media holding company of Interpublic Group.

Prior to the agency world, Stephen held a variety of senior-level technology positions in the music industry, specifically for The Harry Fox Agency, Universal Music Group, and PolyGram. He was a pioneer in the development of the digital music market, leading efforts to create global digital content at the world’s largest record label. He then spearheaded new ways for music publishers to license songs in the digital world and created innovative ways for royalties to be cleared electronically, taking friction out of the digital supply chain.

Stephen is passionate about making the digital world a more effective place to innovate and improve creativity and commerce. He is on the Alumni Council for NYU’s Stern School of Business Entertainment, Media, and Technology Council, and has been a featured speaker at several conferences.
